metadata.name: target_path_swf_5
metadata.description: Comprehensive tests for TARGET_PATH opcode (0x45) - returns target path for MovieClip (e.g., '_root.mc1.mc2') or undefined for non-MovieClip values. Tests number, string, zero, and undefined inputs. Includes standalone C test demonstrating full MovieClip hierarchy support.

notes: Full implementation with MovieClip hierarchy support. MovieClip infrastructure includes parent/child relationships and automatic path construction. The test_movieclip_paths.c standalone program demonstrates creating nested MovieClips and verifying correct path generation (_root, _root.mc1, _root.mc1.mc2, etc.). In NO_GRAPHICS mode, MovieClips must be created programmatically; in graphics mode they would be created via display list tags.
